item.title: Desiree add a quote by Linus Torvalds
item.description: "software is like sex : it's better when it's free.." -- Linus Torvalds

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "Some people are settling down, some people are settling and some people refuse to settle for anything less than butterflies." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Norman Mailer
item.description: "There is a no man's land between sex and love, and it alters in the night." -- Norman Mailer

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Desiree add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there" -- George Harrison

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description:
"Do you know, I always thought unicorns were fabulous monsters, too? I never saw one alive before!"
Well, now that we have seen each other," said the unicorn, "if you'll believe in me, I'll believe in you." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Frank Beddor
item.description:
"I tell you to think <i>black</i> thoughts and you come up with that?!" the lieutenant had screamed. "Is a guinea pig <i>bad?</i> Do you consider a guinea pig the representation of all that is evil?"
Maybe... if it's an evil guinea pig." -- Frank Beddor

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Frank Beddor
item.description: "But I killed you,” Alyss said. “Did you?” Red turned to The Cat. “Why wasn’t I informed?" -- Frank Beddor

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If death meant just leaving the stage long enough to change costume and come back as a new character...Would you slow down? Or speed up?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The unreal is more powerful than the real. Because nothing is as perfect as you can imagine it. Because its only intangible ideas, concepts, beliefs, fantasies that last. Stone crumbles. Wood rots. People, well, they die. But things as fragile as a thought, a dream, a legend, they can go on and on. If you can change the way people think. The way they see themselves. The way they see the world. You can change the way people live their lives. That's the only lasting thing you can create." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Desiree add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Desiree add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Truth is, I think naked men are kind of strange looking what with their doodles and ding-dong hanging loose like they do. Nevertheless, there's the curiosity thing. I guess it's another one of those car crash experiences, where you feel compelled to look even if you know you'll be horrified." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "If, however, you take a moment to observe how you actually feel immediately after you criticise someone, you'll notice that you will feel a little deflated and ashamed, almost like you're the one who has been attacked. The reason this is true is that when we criticise, it's a statement to the world and to ourselves, "I have a need to be critical." This isn't something we are usually proud to admit." -- Richard Carlson

item.title: Desiree add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "I can't decide whether I'm a good girl wrapped up in a bad girl, or if I'm a bad girl wrapped up in a good girl. And that's how I know I'm a woman!" -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who is in love is making love the whole time, even when they're not. When two bodies meet, it is just the cup overflowing. They can stay together for hours, even days. They begin the dance one day and finish it the next, or--such is the pleasure they experience--they may never finish it. No eleven minutes for them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Frank Beddor
Desiree add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Be — don't try to become" -- Osho

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Each person comes into this world with a specific destiny--he has something to fulfill, some message has to be delivered, some work has to be completed. You are not here accidentally--you are here meaningfully. There is a purpose behind you. The whole intends to do something through you." -- Osho

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Live a good life. If there are gods and they are just, then they will not care how devout you have been, but will welcome you based on the virtues you have lived by. If there are gods, but unjust, then you should not want to worship them. If there are no gods, then you will be gone, but will have lived a noble life that will live on in the memories of your loved ones." -- Anonymous

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "When you wake up in the morning, tell yourself: the people I deal with today will be meddling, ungrateful, arrogant, dishonest, jealous and surly. They are like this because they can't tell good from evil. But I have seen the beauty of good, and the ugliness of evil, and have recognized that the wrongdoer has a nature related to my own - not of the same blood and birth, but the same mind, and possessing a share of the divine. And so none of them can hurt me. No one can implicate me in ugliness. Nor can I feel angry at my relative, or hate him. We were born to work together like feet, hands and eyes, like the two rows of teeth, upper and lower. To obstruct each other is unnatural. To feel anger at someone, to turn your back on him: these are unnatural." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Hiromu Arakawa
item.description: "Water: 35 liters, Carbon: 20 kg, Ammonia: 4 liters, Lime:1.5 kg, Phosphrus: 800 g, salt: 250g, saltpeter:100g, Sulfer: 80g, Fluorine: 7.5 g, iron: 5.6 g, Silicon: 3g, and 15 other elements in small quantities.... thats the total chemical makeup of the average adult body. Modern science knows all of this, but there has never been a single example of succesful human trasmutation. It's like there's some missing ingredient..... Scientists have been trying to find it for hundreds of years, pouring tons of money into research, and to this day they don't have a theory. For that matter, the elements found in a human being is all junk that you can buy in any market with a child's allowence. Humans are pretty cheaply made." -- Hiromu Arakawa

item.title: Desiree add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "They'll either want to kill you, kiss you, or be you." -- Suzanne Collins
